keyword: how many calories in a pink lady apple
title: How Many Calories in a Pink Lady Apple?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a pink lady apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Pink Lady Apple?
assumptions: Medium-sized (182 g), raw with skin, edible portion (no core/seeds), typical Pink Lady variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, growing conditions, and variety; check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A medium Pink Lady apple provides about 95 kcal and 4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a pink lady apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for a medium-sized one (182 g).

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a pink lady apple?
faqs.a: Around 25 g total carbs, including 4.4 g fiber and 19 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a Pink Lady apple low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.3 g fat per medium apple, mostly unsaturated.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in a pink lady apple?
faqs.a: Smaller apples have fewer calories (e.g., ~72 kcal for 138 g); larger ones more (up to 118 kcal).

faqs.q: Are Pink Lady apples healthier than other varieties?
faqs.a: Similar nutrition to Gala or Fuji; high in fiber and antioxidants, low in calories overall.
